## The problem
Describe the issue you are experiencing here to communicate to the
maintainers. Tell us what you were trying to do and what happened.

The power state of my Panasonic Viera TX-P65VT60E is no longer detected. When the TV is on the state stays off. I can switch on (using a shell command) and off the TV fine, but my automations using the power state don't work anymore.
Ik the previous version of Home Assistant this was working fine.

- Integration causing this issue: Panasonic Viera
